Describe the change and why it is needed.

## How To Test

- [ ] Run `npm run dev`
- [ ] Run `npm start`
- [ ] Verify affected flows manually

## Checklist

- [ ] Changes are focused and scoped
- [ ] Docs updated when needed
- [ ] No secrets, keys, tokens, or `.env` values included
- [ ] Logs/screenshots are redacted
- [ ] Linked issue(s), if applicable
